meanings.definition: Perform (an activity) or exercise (a skill) repeatedly in order to improve or maintain one's proficiency.
meanings.sent1: She practises playing the piano every day to get better.
meanings.sent2: He practises shooting hoops at the basketball court.
meanings.sent3: The cat practises pouncing on its toy mouse for hours.
meanings.sent4: The dancer practises her routine until every move is perfect.
meanings.sent5: The chef practises chopping vegetables with precision.

meanings.definition: Carry out or perform (a particular activity, method, or custom) habitually or regularly.
meanings.sent1: He practises good manners by saying 'please' and 'thank you'.
meanings.sent2: She practises meditation to relax her mind.
meanings.sent3: The dog practises begging for treats with puppy eyes.
meanings.sent4: The student practises studying for exams every night.
meanings.sent5: The gardener practises watering the plants at the same time each day.

meanings.definition: Engage in an activity or exercise for the purpose of training or improving one's skills.
meanings.sent1: The athlete practises running sprints to increase speed.
meanings.sent2: She practises speaking in front of the mirror to build confidence.
meanings.sent3: The bird practises building its nest with twigs and leaves.
meanings.sent4: The artist practises blending colors to create beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent5: He practises solving math problems to sharpen his mind.
